translations: v．电视播放，电视转播：通过电视进行播放或传输。
· The football match was telecasted live.
足球比赛进行了现场直播。

sentences.sentence: The detective series had so far a run of five successful seasons and the seventh and final season will be telecasted from this spring.
sentences.translation: 这部侦探破案剧已经成功终结了5季，最终的第七季将于明年春季开拍。
